::Killfest::

Killfest raises an eyebrow at Motormaster's request. He knew how much 
the Ark meant to time. Even though, as far as he knew, Killfest's life 
didn't originate from Autobots or Decepticons, their destruction would 
certainly change his fate quite a bit. If, that is, that's what these 
bots wanted the Ark for. But he doubted that. Astroblast had mentioned 
them being Decepticons, and no Ark meant no Decepticons.

"The last recorded location of the Ark was in outer space, near the 
planet's moon," Killfest replies, his mind working over possibilites.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster noticed Killfest looking him over, but it was not 
important at
> the moment. "Yaeh, that's about it. We can provide you with some 
heavy duty
> firepower. Mostly in return, I want to know where the Ark is?" He 
said
>
